en.title: Comfortable Living for Senior Cats: Environment and Care Tips
en.content:
As your senior cat's physical abilities change, it is time to review and adapt their living environment.

Accessibility Modifications

Install steps or ramps to high places, place non-slip mats, switch to litter boxes with lower entries, and use raised food dishes to reduce neck strain. These small adjustments make life much easier for senior cats.

Litter Box Adaptations

Senior cats with stiffening joints benefit from litter boxes with low entry points. Increase the number of litter boxes and place them near where the cat spends most of their time. If accidents become more frequent, a veterinary visit may be needed to rule out medical causes.

Temperature Control

Senior cats have more difficulty regulating body temperature. Provide warm beds and blankets, and pay special attention to temperature fluctuations during winter months.

Bonding and Grooming

As self-grooming decreases in senior cats, gentle brushing helps support coat health. Physical contact is also effective for stress reduction. Make it a habit to check for lumps or abnormalities while petting your cat.

zh.title: 老年猫的舒适生活：环境布置与护理要点
zh.content:
随着老年猫身体机能的变化，需要为它们重新审视和调整生活环境。

无障碍化改造

在高处设置台阶或踏板，铺设防滑垫，将猫砂盆入口改为较低的（更换低边猫砂盆），使用食碗支架以减轻颈部负担。这些小小的改善能让老年猫的生活轻松许多。

猫砂盆的改进

对于关节僵硬的老年猫，入口较低的猫砂盆更为理想。增加猫砂盆的数量，放置在猫咪经常待的地方附近。如果乱排泄的情况增多，可能存在疾病因素，建议就医检查。

温度管理

老年猫的体温调节能力变差。请准备温暖的猫窝和毯子，冬季尤其要注意温差变化。

亲密接触与毛发护理

自我梳理减少的老年猫需要主人通过温柔的梳毛来辅助被毛护理。肢体接触对减轻压力也很有效。养成在抚摸猫咪时检查是否有肿块或异常的习惯也很重要。
